pages.text: Alex's Mobs adds a wide variety of new, unique creatures to Minecraft, bringing the animal kingdom to life! $(br2)Explore different biomes and encounter over 80 new mobs, each with distinct behaviors and interactions.
Discover everything from playful Capuchin Monkeys to the menacing Grizzly Bear. $(br2)Some creatures, like the Dropbear, are hostile, while others, like the Elephant, can be tamed and ridden.
Each mob adds a new layer of immersion to the game. $(br2)Hunt down the rare Sunbird, collect unique materials like Orca Whiskers, and explore the fascinating world of Alex's Mobs!
For a comprehensive guide to all the mobs, find the Alex's Mobs book in the Eccentric Tome and delve into the fascinating details of each creature.
